message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great opportunity to purchase this high-quality product. I think you'll really love it!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I'm looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $120?

I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I've had other interested buyers who are willing to pay a premium for this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we discuss a price of $170?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter your offer at $150. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise between our needs.
